data.title: March 2024 – Hallowell & James Obituaries
data.text:
Joan Pintozzi, age 91, of Indian Head Park, passed away at her home on March 28, 2024. Beloved partner of the late Charles O’Connor; loving mother of Gina Marie Gorey & Therese Ann Pintozzi (John) Budziak; proud grandmother of Christopher Gorey, Kyle (Grace) Gorey, Kevin Gorey (partner Joao Queiroga), & Claire Gorey; great-grandmother of Della […]

Read More

Edward Grosse, 91, of Western Springs; beloved husband of Peggy Link Grosse; loving father of Scott Grosse (Debby), Sara Ureel (Dan) and Laura Parrish (Jim); proud Papa of Britton Fossett (Mark), Jamie Grosse (Lindsay), Scott Ureel, Molly Ronovsky (Joe), Will Ureel (Katherine), Jimbo Parrish, Sawyer Lutz (Mark), and Baylor Parrish; adoring great grandfather of Ella […]

Read More

Susan Elizabeth Voytas, age 82, of Burr Ridge, IL formerly of Roseland, passed away on March 27, 2024. Susan was born on September 19, 1941, in Chicago to the late George C. and late Lillian V. Post (nee Carlson). She was preceded in death by her loving husband of 51 years, Ronnie R. Voytas (October […]

Read More

Larry William Kirsch, age 85, resident of Bolingbrook passed from this world to the next at Oak Trace Rehabilitation Center in Downers Grove on March 26. He was born on September 2, 1938 to William and Evelyn Kirsch in Traverse City, MI where he spent his happy youth living on the bay with his parents […]

Read More

Paul C. Daeschler, age 73, of Bolingbrook. Beloved husband of Victoria Conway for 18 years. Loving father of Stacy and step-father of Anthony , Alexis and Phillip Bugajski. Devoted brother of Jim (Laura) Daeschler and Mary (Ralph) Hoversten. Dear brother-in-law of Mary Ann (Gary) Krasno and Timothy (Ellen Babbitt) Conway. Fond uncle to many nieces […]

Read More

Russell Marvin Evans of Indian Head Park, IL died on March 20, 2024 at the age of 90. He was born in Rebecca, GA on September 28, 1933, the seventh son and two daughters of the late William Marvin and the late Ruby Little Evans. Mr. Evans graduated from Sycamore High School, Sycamore, GA, in […]

Read More

Jeanne Marie McLain, age 67, of Plainfield. Loving mother of Shane, Haley (Collin Voitik) and Kendall. Cherished cousin John (Sue) Lusk and Gerrie Lusk. Dear aunt of Jaime Lusk. Devoted daughter of the late Joseph and the late Joan Sanek. Visitation 10 a.m. Saturday March 30th until time of funeral service 1 p.m. at Hallowell […]

Read More

Melissa Sue Russell, age 46, of Lisle. Beloved wife of Kevin. Loving mother of Kylie, Ty, Ally, Brooke, Caden, Sullivan and Harper. Devoted daughter of Susan Quenzler and the late John Brands. Dear sister of Ryan Brands (Tammy Butkus) and Peter (Christy) Brands. Fond aunt of many. Visitation 3 to 9pm Monday, April 1, 2024 […]

Read More

Joseph John Andruzzi, Jr., age 59, of La Grange, passed away peacefully on March 22nd, 2024 surrounded by his loving family. Devoted husband of Dari (nee Horst); proud father of Melissa, Jessica (Billy) Hamer, and Rebecca; cherished brother of Mary (Jeff) Richman, Michelle (Mark) Riemer, and Michael (Mari); loving son of Mary and the late Joseph; […]

Read More

James Richard Heller, age 79, of LaGrange passed away on March 19th, 2024. Beloved husband of Catherine Sheehan Heller. Loving father of Beth Eckert and Katy Sarner. Fond grandfather of Hannah, Danny, Kevin, Ainsley, and Samantha. Dear uncle and friend to many. James was a proud veteran who loved spending time on the golf course. […]
